NOTE: at 24:24 at this 
    

    Why is background NOK on github page?

Commands:
gem install jekyll bundler
bundle init
# Then in Gemfile: 
    gem "jekyll"
bundle


# Then to run in local-host:
bundle exec jekyll serve
or 
jekyll s

# This is to push for production:
JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
